articles.description: Jade Gresham will be one of two new faces heading into tomorrow's AAMI Community Series opener against Carlton.
articles.content:
St Kilda will field a 26-man side for tomorrow night's AAMI Community Series opener against Carlton, with Jade Gresham one of two new faces from last week's practice match at Arden Street Oval.
